Class Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.model.Attribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeListener

    public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeListener
    Class to set Adventurer attributes. It contains a type and a value.

    1.0

    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
